layers.title: Layers
layers.challengeText: Low user engagement and high churn rate affecting growth metrics.
layers.solutionText: Implemented advanced user behavior analytics and personalized onboarding flows.
layers.resultText: Achieved 300% increase in user engagement within 6 months.

sisyphus.title: Sisyphus
sisyphus.challengeText: Poor conversion rates and ineffective marketing campaigns.
sisyphus.solutionText: Redesigned conversion funnels with A/B testing and targeted campaigns.
sisyphus.resultText: Boosted conversion rates by 300% and improved ROI significantly.

quotient.title: Quotient
quotient.challengeText: Complex data visualization needs and poor user experience.
quotient.solutionText: Built intuitive dashboards with real-time analytics and custom reporting.
quotient.resultText: Enhanced user satisfaction by 300% with streamlined data insights.

testimonials.title: Choose the Plan That Fits You Best

reviews.name: Amanda Schmidt
reviews.content: Konvertix transformed our marketing strategy completely. The analytics insights helped us increase our conversion rate by 300% in just 3 months.

reviews.name: Marcus Chen
reviews.content: The automation features saved us countless hours while improving our lead quality. Best investment we've made for our marketing stack.

reviews.name: Sarah Williams
reviews.content: Outstanding platform with incredible support. The team helped us scale from 10K to 100K monthly visitors with their strategic guidance.

reviews.name: David Rodriguez
reviews.content: The reporting capabilities are unmatched. We finally have clear visibility into our marketing ROI across all channels.

reviews.name: Lisa Thompson
reviews.content: Konvertix's AI-powered insights helped us identify new opportunities we never knew existed. Game-changing platform.

reviews.name: Michael Park
reviews.content: From setup to execution, everything is seamless. The platform grows with your business needs perfectly.
